name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a sweet, playful Golden who loves fetch and belly rubs. He's house-trained and knows basic commands. Great with other dogs and children.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a gentle kitten who enjoys sunbeams and feather toys. She's spayed, vaccinated, and ready for a cozy home.

name: Cooper
description: Cooper has the classic beagle howl and a nose for adventure. He loves sniffing trails and would thrive in an active home.

name: Bella
description: Bella takes time to warm up but becomes a devoted lap cat. She prefers a quiet home without young children.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a puppy at heart! She's working on leash manners and would love an adopter with time for training.

name: Max
description: Max is a well-trained gentleman. He knows sit, stay, down, and heel. He'd do best as the only pet.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie has the classic corgi sploot and endless energy. He's great with cats and kids.

name: Lucy
description: Lucy was a stray who is learning to trust. She needs a patient adopter and a quiet home.

name: Bear
description: Bear is a handsome husky with one blue eye. He needs a secure yard and an active family.

name: Molly
description: Molly is a champion snorer and cuddler. She's great for apartment living.

name: Oliver
description: Oliver is a massive, fluffy cat who follows you room to room. He's good with gentle dogs.

name: Sadie
description: Sadie needs a job! She excels at agility and would love a home with space to run.

name: Jack
description: Jack is a tiny dog with a big personality. He's a professional squirrel detector.

name: Chloe
description: Chloe will talk your ear off! She loves perching on high furniture and watching birds.

name: Rosie
description: Rosie has the best smile in the shelter. She's been waiting 8 months for her forever home.
